fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / CLOAK JUMP
fields.Description: You see a policeman-cloak -- jump to it. Get it. If you're above, to be precise! Otherwise, you can just pick it up or whatever.

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant..." (Point to the cloak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant..." (Point to the cloak.) "I think that's mine."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  Variable["cargo.cloak_inland_yours"]  and  Variable["backyard.cloak_is_yours"] == false

fields.Title: Shivers: "The corpse is dominating the yard a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse is dominating the yard and the stench is nauseating, even so far from the epicentre. It brings tears to your eyes.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think there's a certain beauty i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think there's a certain beauty in this giant pair of pliers. But you're right, we were focusing on your *cloak*..."

fields.Title: You: "What was that about a drink? Wouldn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What was that about a drink? Wouldn't that ruin the moment?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "*I will shield you from the element..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *I will shield you from the elements and give my life for yours* -- that's what the cloak is relaying.

fields.Title: You: "Damn, you're right! Beer gushing in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn, you're right! Beer gushing into my face would really *nail it* right now.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you really think this cloak is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you really think this cloak is mine? Should I go for it? Jump?"

fields.Title: You: "Close your eyes, let your senses ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Close your eyes, let your senses take in the world around you.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The little backyard, Kingdom of Cun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The little backyard, Kingdom of Cuno, looks almost idyllic when it's not dominated by a decomposing human being.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Fine, be boring, breathe! -- Get hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fine, be boring, breathe! -- Get high on some of that sweet-sweet O, baby!

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "As you let go a tidal wave of tears..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you let go a tidal wave of tears breaks through the dam and washes away everything.

fields.Title: Empathy: "The look in his eyes is a mix of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The look in his eyes is a mix of the engineer-like interest and the wonder of a six year old seeing a horse for the first time.

fields.Title: You: "Just a cop's cloak... I don't want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just a cop's cloak... I don't want to deal with this right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "The cloak does not concern me at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cloak does not concern me at the moment. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "No one hears your shouts, but it ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No one hears your shouts, but it makes you feel powerful inside. Now, with your feet firmly planted on the concrete, the noise of the harbour rushes back in.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "The necktie is guiding you through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The necktie is guiding you through this. It's your spirit animal, both your nemesis and friend. Suddenly a feeling of ease brushes through you -- you're fine again.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was under the assumption we coul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was under the assumption we could ask the leader of this Union to help us get this body down. This is why we're here, right?" He doesn't wait for you to answer.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Indeed it is."
fields.Dialogue Text: Indeed it is.

fields.Title: Logic: "Considering the limited police pres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Considering the limited police presence in Martinaise -- you think we might take a leap of logic and say it's yours?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "As the concrete floor welcomes you,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the concrete floor welcomes you, you realize it's been a while since you felt so alive, alert, capable. Must be the adrenaline.

fields.Title: You: "(Tug on your tie.) God, now I can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Tug on your tie.) God, now I can't breathe at all... Stop doing this to me, necktie, you were supposed to be a *friend*!

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "After a while your sobbing stops. U..."
fields.Dialogue Text: After a while your sobbing stops. Up here no one saw the little meltdown you just had and your heart actually feels lighter now. Time to proceed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure." He looks at you, worried. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure." He looks at you, worried. "Just be careful, okay? Looks like you almost strained a muscle there."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "That machine is a Kvalsund 10-20 HK..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That machine is a Kvalsund 10-20 HK.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are we doing? We're awfully c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are we doing? We're awfully close to breaking into the industrial harbour -- they're bound to have information for us. I thought that was our intention..."

fields.Title: You: "You son of a gun, it's my cloak!"
fields.Dialogue Text: You son of a gun, it's my cloak!

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "Unaware of your existence the cloak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unaware of your existence the cloak continues its helpless flapping.

fields.Title: You: "Just let it all out, let it go, let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just let it all out, let it go, let it happen.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "His eyes trace the crane's contour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His eyes trace the crane's contour as if trying to memorize its majestic shape. Then he notices your gaze.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "No one is listening to your words,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No one is listening to your words, but it doesn't matter. You feel pride. Now, with your feet firmly planted on the concrete, the noise of the harbour rushes back in.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, it doesn't seem too dangerou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, it doesn't seem too dangerous -- two metres tops. Whenever you're ready to do it, I'll be right behind you."

fields.Title: You: "I guess it's probably nothing. [Lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I guess it's probably nothing. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, not right now." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, not right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""FRANCONEGRO!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "FRANCONEGRO!!!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The service cloak issued to you by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The service cloak issued to you by your station? Yes, yes I do."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "The sadness, the stress, the failur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sadness, the stress, the failures of the past and present and the weight of being you. It would wash you away, too, if it weren't for the firm grip of your necktie.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "He's so on the money, *bratan*. Jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's so on the money, *bratan*. Just imagine yourself dual-wielding a bottle and a flaming cigarette! Whilst airborne!

fields.Title: Shivers: "Martinaise goes about its daily rou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Martinaise goes about its daily routine as you soar through the air. The loud voices of protesters mix with the engine sounds from the traffic jam; waves crash against the pier and dense, salty sea air fills your lungs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey, hey... what happened?" He sou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, hey... what happened?" He sounds genuinely worried.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Feel the squeeze, baby!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Feel the squeeze, baby!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns back to the sad piece of f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns back to the sad piece of fabric flapping in the wind.
fields.Sequence: FocusCamera(CloakReturnCam); PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, end); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimCraneReturnMarker, 0, false)@2;

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes... we were in the middle of so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes... we were in the middle of something -- your cloak..."
fields.Sequence: FocusCamera(CloakReturnCam); PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, end); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimCraneReturnMarker, 0, false)@2;

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. We can always come back when..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. We can always come back when you're feeling better. It's just a cloak after all." He looks around.

fields.Title: You: ""A cop's cloak! It's a cop's cloak!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A cop's cloak! It's a cop's cloak!!!"

fields.Title: You: "Look around."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look around.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hell yeah!" The lieutenant exclaim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hell yeah!" The lieutenant exclaims. "My climbing might not have been as disco as your jump, but can we still get an Ace's High?"

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "The white rectangle, now clearly vi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The white rectangle, now clearly visible in the wind, seems to confirm your hypothesis. But who's the cop?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The cloak? I *do* think it's yours..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The cloak? I *do* think it's yours, yes. As to whether you should go for it..." He looks over the ledge, at the cold pavement below.

fields.Title: You: ""Look, lieutenant. (Point to the cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, lieutenant. (Point to the cloak.) Someone left their cloak behind."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  Variable["backyard.cloak_is_yours"] == false  and  Variable["cargo.cloak_inland_yours"] == false

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Don't be ridiculous, of course not."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be ridiculous, of course not.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or it could be that we're just *ex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or it could be that we're just *exploring*." He looks around, wind rustling his hair.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You could probably make the jump...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You could probably make the jump. You look like you've done some track and field in your day."

fields.Title: You: "Don't let go of the moment yet."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let go of the moment yet.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["backyard.jump_shivers_fired"] == true  and  Variable["backyard.cloak_electrochem_ruiner"] == false  and  Variable["backyard.cloak_shivers_ruiner"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Not bad, not too bad at all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not bad, not too bad at all."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "I got you, I got you, *bratan*. Let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I got you, I got you, *bratan*. Let me just adjust your breathing a little bit... There, isn't that better?

fields.Title: You: ""I'm alright, Kim... I... I just......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm alright, Kim... I... I just..." (Keep tugging on your tie.) "I can't *breathe*."

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "As your fingers touch the tarpaulin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As your fingers touch the tarpaulin it almost feels like the cloak wants to deliver a message of comfort through your fingertips...

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "Looks like someone left his tarpaul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like someone left his tarpaulin cloak hanging on the railing here.

fields.Title: Logic: "You are the cop. It's your cloak. D..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are the cop. It's your cloak. Don't make things complicated.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Will you? Because it feels like you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Will you? Because it feels like you strained a muscle there. Or two.

fields.Title: You: "Interesting. Why would someone leav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Interesting. Why would someone leave a cloak there, and how can I get to it?

fields.Title: CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true  and  CheckEquippedGroup("alcohol") == false
CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true  and  CheckEquippedGroup("alcohol") == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true  and  CheckEquippedGroup("alcohol") == false

fields.Title: !(CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true  and  CheckEquippedGroup("alcohol") == false)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true  and  CheckEquippedGroup("alcohol") == false) == false

fields.Title: Shivers: "And its de-facto ruler, Cuno the Gr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And its de-facto ruler, Cuno the Gremlin King, is pointing at *you*, talking to his friend. What is he saying?

fields.Title: You: "Continue the voyage through the sal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Continue the voyage through the salty air.

fields.Title: You: ""Kvalsund 10-20 HK..." (Point at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kvalsund 10-20 HK..." (Point at the crane.)

fields.Title: You: ""It's just a machine, lieutenant. L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just a machine, lieutenant. Like a giant hammer or a pair of pliers. Nothing to see here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, that's one way of putting it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, that's one way of putting it." He turns to you with a faint smile, then looks back at the crane. "It's certainly an impressive achievement of engineering."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Don't really know why you haven't y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't really know why you haven't yet.

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "The tarpaulin cloak swings alone fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tarpaulin cloak swings alone for a while there in the wind. No one's coming for it anymore.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Man down! A trooper has been left b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Man down! A trooper has been left behind the enemy lines!

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "When the wind ruffles the cloak you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: When the wind ruffles the cloak you can most definitely see a white rectangle on its back.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is it?" He looks at you, impressed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it?" He looks at you, impressed. "Kvalsund makes lot of heavy equipment, but this is phenomenal even for them."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You could swear it's more of an ins..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could swear it's more of an instinct than anything else, but you *know* it's a cop's cloak.
fields.Alternate1: You could swear it's more of an instinct than an actual sight, but you *know* there's the RCM's signature rectangle on the cloak. It's a cop's cloak.

fields.Title: Logic: "Nailed it!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Nailed it!

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Ankles tingling from the tension, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ankles tingling from the tension, blood roaring in your ears -- you are ready for your rendezvous with the concrete pavement below.

fields.Title: Authority: "We'll take care of that body too. W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We'll take care of that body too. We'll take care of all of it!

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Tears run down your face. You're cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tears run down your face. You're clutching your chest and mumbling incoherently. How much worse can it get?

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Also, you should be having a drink..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also, you should be having a drink right now -- you should have a bottle of alcohol in your hand *right now*.

fields.Title: You: "No, a drink *would* ruin the pristi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, a drink *would* ruin the pristine beauty of this moment of ultimate sobriety.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand. We can always come b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I understand. We can always come back when you're feeling better. It's just a cloak after all."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "The necktie lets go a little, its v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The necktie lets go a little, its vicious grip easing around your neck. Colours return to the world around you.

fields.Title: Volition: "You could have died there! Shit, sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could have died there! Shit, shit, shit, shit... I'm failing you. This wasn't part of our deal!

fields.Title: You: "Grab the cloak. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Grab the cloak. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's thinking you've forgotten wher..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's thinking you've forgotten where you are again.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Then he turns back to the sad piece..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then he turns back to the sad piece of fabric flapping in the wind.
fields.Sequence: FocusCamera(CloakReturnCam); PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, end); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimCraneReturnMarker, 0, false)@2;

fields.Title: You: "The tears just come. From nowhere...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tears just come. From nowhere. Like a sudden guerrilla attack from the bushes, they overwhelm you.

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks, I think it's working." (Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks, I think it's working." (Let go of your tie.)

fields.Title: You: ""Motherfucker..." (Let out a whistl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Motherfucker..." (Let out a whistle.) "Now that's a huge crane!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I knew you could do it!" The lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew you could do it!" The lieutenant exclaims. "My climbing down might not have been as disco as your jump, but at least we can explore the harbour now."

fields.Title: You: ""Look, lieutenant! (Point to the fl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, lieutenant! (Point to the flapping cloak.) Someone left his cloak behind."

fields.Title: You: ""What exactly are we doing up here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What exactly are we doing up here?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Holy wow, that's *high*! You'd have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Holy wow, that's *high*! You'd have to be a total madman to jump. This is certain death!
fields.Alternate1: Nope! No! That's still too high. What were you thinking, you're not a gymnast, you're a boxer -- and you've climbed WAY too high up here...
fields.Alternate2: Holy wow, that's *high*! 'Doesn't seem dangerous...' The lieutenant must be crazy to suggest that! This is certain death. (Vertigo almost pushes you over the edge.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey, hey... what's happening? You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, hey... what's happening? You okay?" He sounds genuinely worried.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm alright, Kim... I... I just ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm alright, Kim... I... I just can't do it right now."

fields.Title: You: ""You son of a gun, it's a cop's clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You son of a gun, it's a cop's cloak!"

fields.Title: You: "Just let me fucking *breathe*, Horr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just let me fucking *breathe*, Horrific Necktie.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The wind is aggressive up here. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The wind is aggressive up here. The lieutenant looks at the enormous crane towering in the distance, over the container yard.
fields.Sequence: FocusCamera(KvalCam); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimCraneMarker, 0, false)@0.8->Message(onMarker); PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, kvalsund_start)@Message(onMarker);

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It was probably you." He look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It was probably you." He looks at you. "It does bear the RCM insignia after all."

fields.Title: You: ""You think I should get it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think I should get it?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Time is running out -- continue the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Time is running out -- continue the voyage and celebrate later.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But I digress. We were focusing on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I digress. We were focusing on your *cloak* here." He looks at the sad piece of fabric flapping in the wind.
fields.Sequence: FocusCamera(CloakReturnCam); PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, end); TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimCraneReturnMarker, 0, false)@2;

fields.Title: You: "Go for the cloak -- jump over the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go for the cloak -- jump over the ledge!

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "His words remain indiscernible. No..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His words remain indiscernible. No matter -- it's time to start thinking about the landing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was under the impression we're o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was under the impression we're on our way to meet the king of this *castle under siege* -- Evrart -- one of the people we're interviewing. This way we may be able to get around his henchmen."

fields.Title: You: "Let him have this moment of wonder."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him have this moment of wonder.

fields.Title: You: "I have a bottle in hand right now -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I have a bottle in hand right now -- I could go for it!

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "With your feet firmly planted on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With your feet firmly planted on the concrete, the noise of the harbour rushes back in.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "This is *your* cloak. You can feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is *your* cloak. You can feel it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It does bear the RCM insignia..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It does bear the RCM insignia. And we're the only detectives in Martinaise."

fields.Title: You: "Ignore the cloak. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Ignore the cloak. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "As you leap in the air, a chilly br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you leap in the air, a chilly breeze engulfs you, sharpening you senses.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""Flying f****t... winged pig... shi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Flying f****t... winged pig... shit is airborne..." These are the only words the wind coming in from the Insulindian ocean carries to you.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The cloak looks like a bag of goodi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cloak looks like a bag of goodies floating in the wind. Who knows what its pockets may hide?!

fields.Title: You: ""Right, I can't do it right now --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, I can't do it right now -- I'll make the jump next time."

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "Looks like someone left his tarpaul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like someone left his tarpaulin cloak hanging on the railing here. There is a white rectangle clearly visible on its back.
fields.Alternate1: The tarpaulin cloak is still hanging on the railing. The white rectangle of the Revachol Citizens Militia is clearly visible on its back.
fields.Alternate2: Looks like someone left his tarpaulin cloak hanging on the railing here. The white rectangle of the Revachol Citizens Militia is clearly visible on its back.

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "A tarpaulin cloak is still caught o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A tarpaulin cloak is still caught on the railing. No one has claimed it for their own.
fields.Alternate1: A tarpaulin cloak with possible RCM markings is still caught on the railing.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "That would be incredibly unsound at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That would be incredibly unsound at this moment.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It is probably yours. It does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It is probably yours. It does bear the RCM insignia after all. Now -- how to retrieve it?" He judges the drop.
fields.Alternate1: "Yes. It's probably yours. It bears the RCM insignia and you have a habit of being careless with your equipment..." He judges the drop.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay, you're just having a *l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's okay, you're just having a *little* panic attack. Try to breathe as slowly as you can, alright?" He shakes you gently by the shoulder.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah. You'd be like the ultimate ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah. You'd be like the ultimate rock and roll mega star. A flying legend.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "What have you done to my precious a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What have you done to my precious alcoholic friend? You're no fun anymore.

fields.Title: Policeman Cloak: "The cloak flaps in the wind, inviti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cloak flaps in the wind, invitingly. It's almost within your reach, if you only just... just go for it.
